item.description:
SCCA Aug 24th Autocross

This is an Autocross (SOLO) event, where you will be participating in your own car. In an autocross you do not race against another car at the same time. They are timed runs through a coned course that is laid out, and the fastest through the course is the winner.

The link above takes you to the event details as laid out be the SCCA.

You get to go on multiple runs through the day based on the number of participants.

The link below is a primer to the concept and the event.
Autocross Primer

The cost is $50 for non SCCA members and $35 for SCCA members.

This is an all day event. Registration starts at 7:30 in the morning, and closes at 8:45. The timed runs go on from 9 am to about 6 pm.

I'll update this event with more information regarding where we can converge and start a caravan toward the NH Motor Speedway.
item.name: Autocross @ NHMS
